metadata.title: CVE-2017-2919 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An exploitable stack based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the xls_getfcell function of libxls 1.3.4. A specially crafted XLS file can cause a memory corruption resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send malicious XLS file to trigger this vulnerability

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-2919` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

r-cran-readxl - 1.0.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: r-cran-readxl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.0-2').
